rules.description: Caps Lock -> Control, Control_L / Fn_L -> Command_L, Control_L / Fn_L -> Caps Lock when tapped
Mouse back button to Back (Forward with control)
Command + Arrow -> Page Up / Page Down / Home / End
Control + [1-9] -> Command + [1-9] in browsers and terminal
Finder: F2 to rename, Return to Open
Option + Tab / Backtick -> switch windows / apps
